title: Did DeRay Mckesson Tweet and Delete Disregard for ‘Facebook Live’ Incident in Chicago?
subtitle: A less than credible Twitter account spread a fake tweet attributed to  civil rights activist DeRay Mckesson, suggesting he said he had "no problem" with a violent act in Chicago.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Civil rights activist DeRay Mckesson made and quickly deleted a tweet in which he said he had "no problem" with a contemporaneous viral Facebook Live crime in Chicago.
